mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_slideshow( slideshow_code, slideshow_route, slideshow_sort, slideshow_state, date_start, date_stop, slideshow_good_code, is_delete, version, create_user, create_time ) values ( #{slideshowCode}, #{slideshowRoute}, #{slideshowSort}, 1, #{dateStart}, #{dateStop}, #{slideshowGoodCode}, 0, 0, #{createUser}, now() )
mapper.update: update t_sys_slideshow set is_delete = 1, version = version + 1, update_time = now(), update_user = #{updateUser} where slideshow_code = #{slideshowCode} and is_delete = 0
mapper.select: select * from t_sys_slideshow where is_delete = 0 and slideshow_code = #{slideshowCode}

select * from t_sys_slideshow where is_delete = 0
and slideshow_state = 1
order by slideshow_sort
select count(slideshow_sort) from t_sys_slideshow where is_delete = 0 and slideshow_sort = #{slideshowSort}
select count(slideshow_code) from t_sys_slideshow where is_delete = 0 and slideshow_code = #{slideshowCode}
